InstructionData.Title: Furnace Controller mk2
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Furnace Controller​ # Model: FC-100​ alias Pressure d0​ alias Switch d4​ alias pressure r0​ alias t1 r1​ ​ wait:​ s db Setting 0​ l t1 Switch Setting​ beq t1 0 waitdone​ yield​ j purge​ waitdone:​ yield​ j wait​ ​ purge:​ s db Setting 1​ l t1 Switch Setting​ beq t1 0 aa​ yield​ j wait​ aa:​ l pressure Pressure Setting​ bne pressure 0 bb​ yield​ j regulate​ bb:​ yield​ j purge​ ​ regulate:​ s db Setting 2​ l t1 Switch Setting​ beq t1 0 cc​ yield​ j wait​ cc:​ yield​ j regulate
